name: Example Discipline
flavor: Flavor text and a description of the Discipline goes here, as well as how it plays in combat.

stances.name: Sample Style/Stance
stances.desc: A helpful outline of how a stance or style is defined.
stances.accumulate: This will typically define how a Stance or Style gains Momentum.
stances.refresh: These Tokens are gained during the Refresh Phase.
stances.effect: A primary, typically passive benefit provided by the Stance or Style.
stances.special: A secondary, more specific, benefit provided by the Stance or Style.

techniques.name: Example Technique
techniques.area: Area of Effect of the Technique
techniques.boost: An optional effect with an associated cost that can be paid when the Technique is used.
techniques.cost: An upfront cost typically for more powerful Techniques that must be paid when the Technique is used.
techniques.desc: A sample Technique to outline the different potential parameters.
techniques.effect: The primary effect of the Technique.
techniques.imbue: An upfront cost typically for more powerful Techniques that must be paid when the Technique is selected in the Plotting Phase.
techniques.move: The distance you may Move with this Technique.
techniques.reqs: Requirements for using this Technique, typically the equipment you have Wielded.
techniques.special: The secondary effect of the Technique.
techniques.trigger: A condition that must be fulfilled for this Action to be used, commonly for Reactions.
